name: Seeds of Chaos Style LORA
description:
Replicates the style of the Seeds of Chaos in-game artworks at 1.0 intensity. Lower the intensity to instead give a slight change of style to your images.

Works best with NSFW as it is an adult game. However, it is a nice style and all audiences can enjoy this Lora.

Made with my Lora trainer

modelVersions.name: v1
modelVersions.description:
No trigger word needed for the artstyle. You can use tags mentioning elements found in the game's artworks to get influences of those elements.

Recommended intensities: 0.4 to 1.0
